turns.speaker: adam
turns.text: I can't believe what just happened!  Did you see that amazing sunset?

turns.speaker: sarah
turns.text: Yes...  The colors were absolutely breathtaking.

turns.speaker: adam
turns.text: And look at those clouds!  They're glowing like fire in the sky!

turns.speaker: sarah
turns.text: Nature can be so beautiful  it leaves you speechless.
